node.excerpt: Twilio is an awesome platform that makes it super easy to add SMS, voice, and VOIP functionality to your web applications.This tutorial will…

frontmatter.title: Twilio on Rails - SMS Basics
frontmatter.description: This tutorial will show you how to set up an extremely simple Ruby on Rails application that uses Twilio to send SMS messages from your browser. It’s probably best that you have a basic understanding of RoR.

frontmatter.title: MailChimp, Gibbon, and Rails - Basic Mailing List Setup
frontmatter.description: You’ve made it to the big time when you want to start a mailing list. There are many ESP’s (email service providers) out there, each with respective strengths and weaknesses.
